categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The Alderaanian War Frigate was a warship that served the Royal Alderaan Civil Fleet during the Clone Wars. Later models of this type appeared in service of the Alderaanian Resistance, the Rebel Alliance, the Alliance of Free Planets, and the New Republic.

It was the pride of Alderaan's fleet and the most powerful ship of its time. The basic design of the Frigate measured 250 meters long, and was armed with ten quad turbolaser batteries and four medium ion cannons, as well as a small hangar deck on its bow.
